REM CONFIG CRC IS 7B5A
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
SLEEP,00,200
REM RESET THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040006010008000000000000a5a5
SLEEP,00,200
REM HARDWARE CONFIGURATION
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,04000201002428120E138801F402000C0CFF080203052600000500000000000000000C0C530000000009
SLEEP,00,200
REM Writing CustomA RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,
REM Writing CustomB RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040010010154C059B7F300040242040402420303102D3D3D3D3D3D3D3D2C2C2CE0000000E0000000FCFCE00000000000000000000000404040E04040404040404091949444959595450000000000000000000000000000000000
REM Set DPC table
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000301004AD703FC031F04430466048904AB04CB04E704E504E504E504E504E604E504E704B503D703FC031C04270327032703270327032703270327032703270352037D032C012C012C019595950E
SLEEP,00,200
REM UICC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000A01001A48003C3C04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM SE CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000B01001A48001E1E04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM IOT CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000801000C1F001F000000010203000000
SLEEP,00,200
REM ANTENNA CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400090100200000E10BB801B5FFEC0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
SLEEP,00,200
REM NFCC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400010100050057000606
SLEEP,00,200
REM WRITE CONFIGURATION CRC IN THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,0400060100080000000000007B5A
SLEEP,00,200
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
REM MATCHING ;99.6;3.2;43.9;Differential;Yes;15;560;No;No;ANT;1500;4.7;78;100;1500;77;DNP;150
REM CONFIGURATION ;605.453125;508.3947872789;5.02250638443308;No;No;Differential;Yes;77;560;200;330;20;DNP;ANT;150;27;4.7;100;4.5
REM TEST CONFIG
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,04001101002900000060F0000003E806401000040400040400000000010102020201010102000300400090B0711034
SLEEP,00,200
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
REM TOOL VERSION 2.9
